entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@JackPosobiec RI: Oakland Grove Designated Coronavirus-Specialty Home.

Gov. Raimondo announced the nursing home will receive COVID-19-positive patients cleared to leave hospitals.

Residents who tested positive at hospital were sent back before this announcement too. 
https://t.co/mkcpee6rIi
